course.title: MAT 4371 Applied Probability (3 units)
course.desc: An introduction to stochastic processes, with emphasis on Markov processes. Review of basic probability, limit theorems and conditioning. The Poisson process. Limit theorems for regenerative processes. Discrete-time and continuous-time Markov processes. Hidden Markov processes on finite state spaces. Applications chosen from signal processing, queuing theory, economics, finance and actuarial sciences.Course Component: LecturePrerequisites: MAT 2371, (MAT 2141 or MAT 2342).
